name: @adaswap-testnet/core
description: ðŸ“– Solidity libraries that are shared across Uniswap contracts

scripts.ganache: npx ganache --chain.networkId=200101 --chain.chainId=1 --chain.vmErrorsOnRPCResponse --chain.hardfork=istanbul --miner.defaultGasPrice=20000000000 --miner.blockGasLimit=6721975 --server.port=7545 --wallet.mnemonic='height school space unique renew cable one stumble ring cube artefact plunge'
scripts.test-headless: npm run ganache > /dev/null & npm run test && kill $(lsof -t -i:8545) || kill $(lsof -t -i:8545)
